title: NEC Conduit Fill Calculator | Electrical (US NEC)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let \(A_r\) be the raceway total area (inÂ²), \(p\) the allowable fill fraction from Table 1, and \(A_c=\sum_i n_i\,a_i\) the sum of conductor areas (quantity \(n_i\) times area \(a_i\)). \[ A_{\text{allow}} = p \cdot A_r,\qquad \%\text{Fill} = \frac{A_c}{A_{\text{allow}}}\times 100 \] \(p=\begin{cases} 0.53 & \text{if } N=1\\ 0.31 & \text{if } N=2\\ 0.40 & \text{if } N>2 \end{cases}\) (NEC Ch. 9 Table 1).
